item.title: Paul Tudor Jones says markets on shakier ground than Trump's first term, leaving no room for mistakes
item.description: "There's so many things that are cross currents... this is a completely, totally different landscape than Trump 1.0," Jones said.

item.title: Trump coin leads tumble in meme cryptocurrencies as tariffs rock global markets
item.description: Meme coins plummeted over the weekend as President Donald Trump signed new tariffs, kicking off a trade war that caused investors to dump risk assets.

item.title: How far will tariff sell-off go? What all the major Wall Street firms think
item.description: Tariff headlines can continue to weigh on equities for the foreseeable future, though how far the damage goes ultimately depends on how long the levie...

item.title: Wall Street economists react: Trump's tariffs to raise inflation and lower economic growth
item.description: Inflation could jump back above 3% if Trump's tariff plans are fully implemented, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Here are Monday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Roblox, Caterpillar, Uber, Zillow, Amazon & more
item.description: Here are Monday's biggest calls on Wall Street.
